meanings.definition: Fixed regular payment, typically paid on a monthly basis, made by an employer to an employee.
meanings.sent1: Many workers rely on their salaries to cover their living expenses.
meanings.sent2: The company increased the salaries of all its employees by 10%.
meanings.sent3: The salaries danced into the employees' bank accounts every month like clockwork.
meanings.sent4: In the world of finances, salaries are the lifeblood that keeps the economy flowing.
meanings.sent5: The concept of salaries is ingrained in the modern work culture, shaping people's livelihoods.
